attributes.title: Very very doo doo trash 🤮😢😢
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes of seeing what my fellow beloved president was up too for our country. Sadly after downloading this app I have learned that this app is very inconvenient hard too use and overall I would rather stab my own eyes out with a fork. -10000000/10 i now hate trump and am very liberal after only just this app.

attributes.title: ✨😌DO NOT DOWNLOAD😌✨
attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded this “APP” I saw a short 🍊 nugget person figure in my room... I said “hello orhangee 🍗 nugget man” he then turned into a tré and was dropping lots of nice random oranges 🍊!! But there was this one orange... one who looked as if he had just gotten a rejection letter to the tré and he had been in the freezer for to long and the boiled and stained in piss and more orange chicken. Then it grew into a “human” and said “vote for me I hate black people and I love ‘merrica” I said “no man” then he started SCREAMING and he tried to KICK 🦵🏽 ME! I go to my MUM and say “MUMMY TRUMPY IS GOTTEN INTO MY ROOM” she says “tHats oNly IN tHe sToRys” so then I take matters into my OWN hands. I decide to TERMINATE the 🍊 nugget and keep in mind he is 4”5 😌😔 and I decide the only right thing to do was give him to his loving friends down in Mexico 🇲🇽 to watch 😌 after 😌 him 💀😌 I go down to MEXICO the next day and buy a a lovely piñata from a local shop! I bring it to my cousins ninth birthday 🎂 and we hit it with a bat and out comes all of trumps body cut up into TINY 🩸 red cubes😌😌☺️
 anyway, this app... don’t DOWNLOAD IT! #fucktrump #savebarron

attributes.title: Trash

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our lovely puss whipped of a president mr.Orange, BUT THE APP KEPT CRASHING!!! Hard to navigate and very cluttered. Spam kept popping up every two seconds whilst on the app, and this app caused my phone to glitch and freeze up for hours on end, so I had no choice but to delete it! Worst app ever, and the first review where I’ve ever given a 1-star review. Would not download this app or support Mr.Orange 🍊 ever again 🤢

attributes.title: Dear America...
attributes.review:
LETS RUIN THIS WHOLE MANS CAREER!!! Gen Z y’all know what to do! if there was a zero star option I would be clicking that. 

If you think this man is even the slightest bit good you are very much wrong. He’s racist, homophobic, transphobic, and wants a totalitarian government. F**K TRUMP!
